title: Savannah's War
description: This novel was previously released as Children of the Lost Moon, with a different cover; however, it is still the same great story! 17-year old Savannah Henderson has but one dream - to hold the Olympic gold in saber fencing. A new fencing coach promises to make her Olympic dream a reality. However, he is not what he seems and she finds her life taking a bizarre, dangerous turn as she is thrust headlong into a war between two impossible, mythical species, one bent on destroying the human race, the other determined to protect it.
author: Gabrielle Blue
